FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_1: Welcome to the Orchid network, where the internet belongs to US
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_2: Connect to the entire internet safely and securely from anywhere in the world. Your data is your own, not somebody elseâ€™s
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_3_SUBTITLE: Earn extra income while helping to build a freer, more open society.
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_3: Save, share, trade or exchange Orchid tokens for local or digital currency or to purchase bandwidth from other users on the Orchid network.

DASHBOARD.PLEASE_ADD: Please add some OCT to connect
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_CONNECTION: Your security level determines how many nodes your connection will pass through. Higher security level = more nodes.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_GB_REMAINING: Shows the amount of network traffic you have purchased.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_LOCATION: This is where you will be browsing the internet from.
DASHBOARD.TIP_LOCATION_CONTENT: Select the default location for your internet connection. This is where you will appear to be connecting to the internet from.
DASHBOARD.TIP_FUND_CONTENT: You will need to add some Orchid tokens (OCT) to your wallet in order to use the Orchid Network.

WALLET_SETUP.TITLE: Time to fund your account
WALLET_SETUP.TRANSFER_COPY: Transfer some Orchid tokens to your wallet to start using Orchid
WALLET_SETUP.WHERE: Where can I get Orchid tokens?
WALLET_SETUP.HOW: How do I transfer tokens to my wallet?
